        public static void setVisible(View view)
        Sets the visibility of the provided view as visible.
        If the parameter view is null, no change will be done.
        Parameters:

      • hideInputKeyboard

        public static void hideInputKeyboard(Context context,
                                     View view)
        Generic method to hide the input keyboard.
        Will hide the input keyboard, if given view and context both are not null.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        view - -View from which input keyboard has to be hidden.
        See Also:
        InputMethodManager#hideSoftInputFromInputMethod(android.os.IBinder, int)}.

      • recycleImagesFromView

        public static void recycleImagesFromView(View view)
        Recycle all the images from the provided View or ViewGroup.
        Recycles Bitmap from the view.
        Recursively traverses if the provided view is ViewGroup for recycling the image / bitmap.
        No changes are done if the view is null.

        This operation cannot be reversed, so it should only be called if you are sure there are no further uses for the bitmap.
        Parameters:
        view - -View.
        See Also:
        Bitmap#recycle()}.

      • isLayoutRtl

        public static boolean isLayoutRtl(View view)
        Checks whether the view is from right to left..
        If the view is null then false will be returned.
        If android OS / API version is less than 17 / VERSION_CODES#JELLY_BEAN_MR1, then false will be returned.
        All the view before API Level 17 are left to right.
        Parameters:
        view - -View for which layout needs to checked.
        See Also:
        View#getLayoutDirection()}.

      • getParentDimensions

        public static int getParentDimensions(ViewGroup parent,
                                      boolean isWidth)
        Gets dimension of the viewgroup parent, whether the view is LayoutParams#WRAP_CONTENT or LayoutParams#MATCH_PARENT.
        Parameters:
        parent - -ViewGroup.
        isWidth - -boolean value to specify whether it is width or not.
        Returns:
        int - LayoutParams#WRAP_CONTENT or LayoutParams#MATCH_PARENT.

      • getViewSize

        public static int[] getViewSize(View view)
        Gets the view size for the given view.
        If the given view is null then -1. 
          [0]=widthOfTheView.
  [1]=heightOfTheView.
        Parameters:
        view - -View.
        Returns:
        int[] -size of the view
        See Also:
        View#measure(int, int)}.

      • getCheckedRadioButtonText

        public static java.lang.String getCheckedRadioButtonText(RadioGroup radioGroup)
        Get text/ label text of the checked RadioButton from the given radio group.
        If the radiogroup is null, then blank string will be returned.
        If no RadioButton is checked, blank string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        radioGroup - -RadioGroup.
        Returns:
        String text / label text of the checked radio button.
        See Also:
        RadioGroup#getCheckedRadioButtonId()}.
